pkgmetadata.longdescription: Make Requests from the Bureau of Labor Statistics API // Implements v2 of the B.L.S. API for requests of survey information and time series data through 3-tiered API that allows users to interact with the raw API directly, create queries through a functional interface, and re-shape the data structures returned to fit common uses. The API definition is located at: https://www.bls.gov/developers/api_signature_v2.htm.
